title: A Look Ahead into Week 9
description:
Today our hosts Wendi Nix, David Pollack, and Roddy Jones are joined by UNC head coach Mack Brown. The group discuss UNC's upcoming matchup versus Pittsburgh and what that means for the ACC Coastal. The crew then discusses the Ohio State at Penn State matchup, looking back at the close games between the two in the last 8 years, as well as games with playoff implications and Illinois's chances to win the Big 10 West. We finish with a discussion about Texas's woes this season.

itunes:subtitle: Wendi Nix, David Pollack, and Roddy Jones look into this week's matchup ahead of Week 9
